amendment.description: To require a report on reform of the education sector in Pakistan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3694 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3694 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S9588-9592; text: CR S9589) To require a report on reform of the education sector in Pakistan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3694 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3694 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Biden.
